verbose_text: Indeed, we have reported that BiP treatment of PB monocyte derived DCs skewed DC development toward indoleamine 2,3-dioxygenase + (IDO +) anti-inflammatory DCs and that direct cell contact between BiP treated IDO + DC and autologous T cells, in the absence of further BiP, led to the induction of cytotoxic T-lymphocyte-associated antigen 4 (CTLA-4) + regulatory T cells 9.
evidence: DCs and that direct cell contact between BiP-treated IDO +  DC and autologous T cells, in the absence of further BiP, led to the induction of cytotoxic T-lymphocyte-associated antigen 4
